metadata.title: Professional Lighting Setups - Veo 3 Prompts
metadata.description: Professional lighting techniques and setups for cinematic Veo 3 video generation

prompt_templates.name: Three-Point Lighting Classic
prompt_templates.description: Standard professional lighting setup with key, fill, and rim lights

prompt_structure.base_prompt: Three-point lighting setup, {key_light_position} key light, {fill_light_intensity} fill light, {rim_light_color} rim light
prompt_structure.technical_specs: Balanced exposure, controlled shadows, professional contrast ratio
prompt_structure.lighting_parameters: Key: 45-degree angle, Fill: opposite side soft, Rim: back separation

examples.prompt: Three-point lighting setup, 45-degree left key light, soft fill light, warm rim light, balanced exposure, controlled shadows, professional contrast ratio, interview setting, corporate professional mood
Three-point lighting setup, dramatic high key light, minimal fill light, blue rim light, balanced exposure, controlled shadows, professional contrast ratio, creative portrait session, artistic mood
examples.expected_result: Artistic portrait with depth and dimension

best_practices: Position key light at 45-degree angle from subject
Use fill light to control shadow depth
Add rim light for subject separation
Maintain consistent color temperature
common_mistakes: Missing rim light losing subject separation
Poor key light angle creating unflattering shadows

prompt_templates.name: Golden Hour Natural
prompt_templates.description: Warm, soft natural lighting during the golden hour period

prompt_structure.technical_specs: Soft directional light, warm color cast, natural gradient shadows
prompt_structure.time_parameters: Early morning or late afternoon, low sun angle, warm tones

examples.prompt: Golden hour lighting, low sun behind subject, warm 3200K color temperature, soft gradient shadows, soft directional light, warm color cast, natural gradient shadows, outdoor portrait session
Golden hour lighting, side-lit through window, warm 2800K color temperature, gentle directional shadows, soft directional light, warm color cast, natural gradient shadows, indoor scene

best_practices: Shoot during actual golden hour for authenticity
Use warm color temperatures (2800-3200K)
Position subject relative to sun for desired effect
Embrace soft, natural shadows
common_mistakes: Too cool color temperature losing warmth
Harsh shadows inconsistent with golden hour

prompt_templates.name: Dramatic Chiaroscuro
prompt_templates.description: High contrast lighting with strong shadows and bright highlights

prompt_structure.technical_specs: High contrast ratio, selective illumination, artistic shadow play
prompt_structure.mood_parameters: Dramatic, mysterious, artistic, film noir influence

examples.prompt: Dramatic chiaroscuro lighting, single hard light from left, deep shadows, bright selective highlights, high contrast ratio, selective illumination, artistic shadow play, film noir atmosphere
Dramatic chiaroscuro lighting, window light cutting across scene, deep shadows, controlled bright highlights, high contrast ratio, selective illumination, artistic shadow play, mystery mood

best_practices: Use single, hard light source for strong shadows
Control spill light to maintain contrast
Position light for dramatic facial modeling
Embrace deep shadows as compositional elements
common_mistakes: Too much fill light reducing contrast
Poor shadow placement losing dramatic effect

prompt_templates.name: Soft Beauty Lighting
prompt_templates.description: Flattering, even lighting designed to minimize harsh shadows and enhance features

prompt_structure.technical_specs: Large soft light sources, minimal shadows, flattering skin tones
prompt_structure.setup_parameters: Ring light, softboxes, or large diffused sources

examples.prompt: Soft beauty lighting, heavily diffused key light, even illumination across face, minimal shadow depth, large soft light sources, minimal shadows, flattering skin tones, beauty portrait session
Soft beauty lighting, ring light setup, even illumination, virtually shadowless, large soft light sources, minimal shadows, flattering skin tones, makeup tutorial setting
examples.expected_result: Clear, even lighting for detail work

best_practices: Use large, diffused light sources
Position lights close to subject for soft quality
Minimize harsh shadows on face
Maintain consistent, flattering skin tones

prompt_templates.name: Motivated Practical Lighting
prompt_templates.description: Lighting that appears to come from visible sources within the scene

prompt_structure.base_prompt: Motivated practical lighting from {light_source}, {color_quality}, naturalistic illumination
prompt_structure.technical_specs: Diegetic light sources, realistic color temperatures, natural falloff
prompt_structure.source_types: Window light, lamps, candles, neon signs, screens, fire

examples.prompt: Motivated practical lighting from desk lamp, warm tungsten color quality, naturalistic illumination, diegetic light sources, realistic color temperatures, natural falloff, home office setting

Motivated practical lighting from neon storefront signs, cool blue-pink color quality, naturalistic illumination, diegetic light sources, realistic color temperatures, natural falloff, urban night scene

best_practices: Match color temperature to visible light source
Respect natural light falloff patterns
Ensure practical sources are visible in frame
Layer multiple practical sources naturally
common_mistakes: Lighting too bright for apparent source
Wrong color temperature for light type
Unnatural light direction for source position

light_quality_descriptors.motivated: Appears from visible source in scene

usage_notes.scene_matching: Choose lighting to support narrative mood
